OOC: He is, and so are Jeff, Alloran, and Megan, although Megan's never on =
anymore. Unless the Council Election is over, Hedge isn't a founder yet. My=
 pal Jer is also getting on the Council, it seems, and my good friend Allor=
an is sadly leaving the Council, as it seems right now. My friend Jeff is s=
taying on, it seems, and my pal Lurker didn't go on at all. Alot of mixed e=
motions about this whole Coucil Election for me!...
